pr_title: [ContentEncoding] Add two fields in blob property

timeline.message: [ContentEncoding] Add two fields in blob property

timeline.bodyText:
I think this null handling case is not actually required, although I see that this pattern was used before in this method.
sb.append("ContentEncoding=").append(null) will work and return "ContentEncoding=null"
timeline.author: cgtz

timeline.bodyText: For a get blob response, this should be set as the HTTP standard Content-Encoding header instead of x-ambry-content-encoding
timeline.author: cgtz

replies.bodyText: Sure. Thanks for catching that, fixed it.
replies.author: SophieGuo410

timeline.bodyText: In our LinkedIn SecurityService, we use the filename to set the value of the Content-Disposition. Not sure if we want to port that behavior here.
timeline.author: cgtz

timeline.bodyText: minor: is there a unit test to verify these two properties in BlobIdTransformerTest?
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: Will add the test cases once the serialize part is done.
